short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows 'Paywall' sites links as '$$$'. Preserves original text.  Great on Drudge. Also flags sites that do not work with adblockers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows 'Paywall' sites links as '$$$'. Preserves original link text and moves link to '$$$' text. Great on Drudge. Also flags sites that do not work with adblockers.  Does not in any way circumvent Paywall sites or logon restrictions, only warns that a link goes to a Paywall site.
